name: IT201_Sprint3_Gavin_Dawson
description:
This is an aim trainer type game. 

The goal of the game is to click the target as many as possible before they get deleted.

How the targets behave:

Spheres move to a random position after being hit. The X-shaped target moves in kind of an L shape and shrinks while it moves. The cube moves to different points randomly. The cylinder fly in from the side of the screen and gets deleted after being hit. The flat cube spins like a coin while it moves from point to point.

To show crosshair check the enable crosshair box.

Choose crosshair from the dropdown box.

Adjust the slider in the bottom right to change the target's color.

The game starts when you click the start button.

Have fun!!
